posts.name: Marissa
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.39 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group .

Release notes:

  • When you know a ton of people, it can impact your life in unexpected ways. So we fixed a crash that was affecting some users who had several thousand contacts in their address book.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.38 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.39.0.465-beta

60 new commits since 7.38.0.451-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.39 [1]

  • Add rudimentary link'n'sync confirmation sheet [2]

  • Add rudimentary link'n'sync spinner on primary device [3]

  • Don't ask for device name if link'n'syncing [4]

  • Drop voiceMessage flag on backed up messages with text [5]

  • Device linking redesign [6]

  • Update backup proto with contact identity key field(s) [7]

  • Update backup proto with view once quote type [8]

  • Report progress for backup import/export [9]

  • Add sample User.xcconfig file [10]

  • Add most group change chat update backup tests [11]

  • Add logging for other validator errors [12]

  • Update libsignal to 0.62.0 [13]

  • Require identity key prefix on backup export and import [14]

  • Adjust backup feature flags [15]

  • Use message timestamp for optimistic backup attachment download comparison [16]

  • Add comment for why chat_item_group_change_chat_update_36/37 are disabled [17]

  • Don't even trigger backup upload job for free tier users [18]

  • Drop ObjC from KeyValueStore [19]

  • Archive Contact recipients for TSContactThreads without SignalRecipients [20]

  • Resolve race in TaskQueueLoaderTest [21]

  • Move chatId assignment to after failable steps [22]

  • Add TSMutex to replace UnfairLock […] [23]

  • Bench memory usage in backups [24]

  • Fix indentation in Atomics.swift [25]

  • Directly adopt KeyValueStore in SDSKeyValueStore [26]

  • Audit OWSOperation for sendability [27]

  • Audit AttachmentDownloadManagerImpl.ProgressStates for sendability [28]

  • Mark actor properties nonisolated where it isn't inferred […] [29]

  • Relocate terms button on RegistrationSplashVC [30]

  • Enumerate call links and sticker packs when exporting backups [31]

  • Use autoreleasepool for backup import/export [32]

  • One KeyValueStore to rule them all [33]

  • Fix missing KeyValueStore change [34]

  • Simplify payment archiving [35]

  • Remove redundant zkcCredential=true [36]

  • Suspend message processing during backups [37]

  • Remove KeyValueStore protocol file [38]

  • Enable some production code in debug builds [39]

  • Add restore button to registration splash screen [40]

  • Drop message bodies longer than 2048 bytes [41]

  • convert badge code from promises to swift concurrency [42]

  • Mark calls without CallRecords as read [43]

  • Log timestamps for backup interaction errors [44]

  • Drop invalid link previews on backup export; ignore them on import [45]

  • Avoid batch updates in updateLastViewedThread [46]

  • Adopt non-deprecated NSKeyedUnarchiver method [47]

  • Fix AudioWaveform decoding warnings [48]

  • Recognize json files in sharesheet [49]

  • Don't cache full TSThreads on backup export [50]

  • Remove unused SDSSwiftSerializable [51]

  • Fix concurrency warnings related to UnfairLock [52]

  • Remove description method that produces warning [53]

  • Don’t fetch contact avatars unless necessary [54]

  • Decode serverPublicParams constant just once [55]

  • Clean up GroupV2Snapshot [56]

  • Fetch GSEs when fetching snapshots [57]

  • Remove throws from serverPublicParams() [58]

  • Update learn more url that was moved [59]

  • Update translations [60]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.38.0.451-beta…7.39.0.465-beta

posts.name: Salt
posts.cooked: Just a heads up for those not in the United States, many employees in the United States have Thursday and Friday off this week for Thanksgiving. Just wanted to let you all know so you don’t think the Signal devs disappeared

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Seems like a few messages on my iPhone did not create push notifications. When I sent myself a message from another device like 4 separate messages also arrived. Some up to 17 minutes late.

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.39.0/b90657b56cc5ce281181d1245fdbc3547110dd5b76a4f8d55ba221c4dd54c167.zip

Signal crashes after trying to edit a message when someone has been removed from it since the message has been sent.
DebugLogs

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.40 release.
